alert.note: Alert for Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Knox; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 12:45PM CDT until May 06 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Grainger County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Union County in east Tennessee... West central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 144 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plainview, or 9 miles south of Maynardville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morristown, Rutledge, Plainview, New Market, Blaine, Luttrell, House Mountain State Park, Panther Creek State Park, Maloneyville and Mascot. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee.
